java.lang.Object

      org.codehaus.groovy.grails.resolve.GrailsRepoResolver

public class GrailsRepoResolver
extends URLResolver

Overrides the default Ivy resolver to substitute the release tag in Grails' repository format prior to a resolve

Graeme Rocher
Since:
